scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix projects/AudioSphere run start" "npm --prefix projects/GeminiChat run start" "npm --prefix projects/QuoteGen run start" "node index.js"
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix "projects/AudioSphere" install --force && npm --prefix "projects/GeminiChat" install --force && npm --prefix "projects/QuoteGen" install --force
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix projects/AudioSphere run dev" "npm --prefix projects/GeminiChat run dev" "npm --prefix projects/QuoteGen run dev" "nodemon index.js"
scripts.build: npm --prefix "projects/AudioSphere" run build && npm --prefix "projects/GeminiChat" run build && npm --prefix "projects/QuoteGen" run build
